This is the brand’s latest and greatest, complete with an onboard color display and all of the usual fixings, and it is now nearly $70 off the list price.

items.title: EcoFlow’s newest + most expansive DELTA Pro Ultra X power station gets $1,300 exclusive savings to a new $6,999 low
items.summary:
Update 1/16: This exclusive low price is continuing for an unknown amount of time longer – don’t miss out!

We’ve secured a fantastic exclusive deal from Wellbots on the new EcoFlow DELTA Pro Ultra X Portable Power Station at $6,999 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5ECO1000 at checkout for an additional $1,000 off. This all-new release from EcoFlow just hit the market last month and carries a $10,597 direct from the brand, whereas it starts lower at $8,299 here. The best of the discounts we’ve seen up until today was our previous exclusive price cut to $7,199. Now, we’ve gotten an even bigger exclusive deal for you with a total $1,300 savings off the going rate and $3,598 off the MSRP, landing it at a new all-time low price that you can’t beat anywhere else.

items.title: Aventon’s former flagship Level 2 legacy e-bike assists you for up to 60 miles of your commuter at $1,499, more
items.summary:
Aventon continues to offer its three most popular legacy e-bikes with up to $500 savings, one of which is the Level 2 Commuter e-bike at $1,499 shipped. Normally priced at $1,899 without discounts, it’s more often been found keeping down around $1,599 over the last year, especially once tariffs ramped up in early 2025, with things since only having gone as low as $1,499. The $400 markdown here is continuing from its November and December holiday sale for the best price of the last year, as Aventon is likely clearing stock to make way for all its newest smart e-bikes that were released across 2025, as well as the new Soltera 3 ADV that just hit the market. Head below to get the rundown on this model and shop the other two e-bikes also included in this sale.

more…

items.title: Segway’s new X4 + i2 AWD robot mower pre-orders open: 10% coupon, 1-year extended support, FREE gear with up to $200 deposit
items.summary:
Only 10 days after Segway Navimow unveiled its four upcoming robotic lawn mowers at CES 2026, the brand is now offering a special pre-order promotion on two of the series to score some savings ahead of next month’s official launch. You can now prep to score Navimow’s new flagship X4 series (either the X430 or X450 robot lawn mowers) with a $200 deposit, or the i2 AWD series (i206 or i210 robot lawn mowers) with a $100 deposit. Putting down your deposits before the official launch on February 13 gives you a coupon code for 10% savings that you can use then, as well as 1-year extended support, and a 36-piece blade kit ($72 value), while the i2 AWD robots also get a free Garage S add-on for the charging station ($200 value).

But when it comes to some of the least expensive options out there from a well-known smart home brand, it’s doesn’t get much more affordable than TP-Link’s Tapo D205 Smart Video Wireless Doorbell that happens to be down at $35 right now.

items.title: Fall asleep under a starry night in the comfort of home with this adorable astronaut space projector at $27
items.summary:
Star Projector Galaxy Night Light Astronaut Space Projector

Buy for $26.50 (Reg. $35)

What we love

Drift off to sleep caressed by the shining beauty of the universe with this night light projector that comes in the form of an adorable astronaut, with a magnetically connected head that can be adjusted to fill whatever space its placed in, as well as a removable moon base and a posable arm. What’s really nice is you don’t have to worry about it staying on all night, as there is an included remote alongside auto-off timers (45 or 90 minutes), allowing you to fall asleep under the stars without being exposed to the elements.
